title: LF players for flex team
body:
Hey guys, I am looking for some players for a ranked flex queue team. All roles apart from ADC are open. Must be at least Silver elo to play and want to actually climb up through the ranks. If you're interested add my account and message me in client with your pref roles. Much love, cheers

IGN:Heheimboosted

replies.body: Are you interested in joining a casual/competitive team? We are currently looking for a person to fill an ADC role? If so add Nekminut
